posts.post_content:
Looking for the following two cards with SC 350, Factory 30 back.

  *    Abbaticchio (brown)
  *    Leifield (pitch)

 raw VG-EX/PSA 4/SGC 50 range preferred but I'm not picky at this point.

If you have either and would consider trade/sale, drop me a line.  Some of what I have to trade is in the links in my sig

Thanks for looking.
--
Mike
Sent you an email earlier - had prob with the scans -They should appear here when I hit send.  let me know if you're interested.   thanks
